Description: This week we will have our open topic during our Bible study CG. Please check with your leaders if you need to prepare anything. Have a exciting discussion time.

Hari Raya Haji. Hope you have a good break as this Friday is the public holiday when Muslim celebrate the day when Abraham was tested by God to sacrifice his son. 

This Sat is our August CONNECT by sign up only. As we have a special speaker whom will be sharing with us on Same Sex Attraction. Looking forward to seeing you.
This week is our CG Freestyle week. Please check with your CG on how you guys want to spend it together. See you in our upcoming August CONNECT (SSA workshop: only for people who sign up)

We will be continuing the CG bible study this week online at 3.30pm.

Lastly, please sign up for the August SSA workshop via your CG leaders by this Sat to get the private ZOOM link.
